title: Start
body:
<<outfit Aig Casual>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
<<outfit J-Pe Casual>>
<<expression J-Pe Neutral>>
<<move Aig StageLeft2>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Man, one day down.
<<move J-Pe StageRight2>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
Hey, Aig.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Oh, he J- Pe.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
So I can't help but notice you've been putting a lot of time promoting yourself lately.
->Yeah!
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    Yeah! It's fun!
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    A word of advice...
->So what?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Uh, yeah. So what?
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    Oh, it's no big deal.
->You threatened?
    <<expression Aig Angry>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Are you feeling threatened, or something?
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<statUp Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe Happy>>
    Please.
<<expression J-Pe Neutral>>
I just think it might be a better use of your time to spend it doing something else.
Dance practice maybe? Vocal training?
I mean, I think of think I'VE got promoting US covered.
<<name Friendship ...>>
You pick up one of the flyers on his bunk.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig Angry>>
Uh, these flyers only have your face on them. And why does it say "J-Pe and the Boys?"
<<move J-Pe StageLeft1>>
<<name Friendship ...>>
He snatches them from you.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
I know what I'm doing! Clearly, YOU don't!.
<<move J-Pe OffStageLeft>>
<<flip Aig>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
...
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
Jesus. What's his problem?
